'''Righteous Resistance''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to fend off the [[Fatui]] during the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[Trail of Subjugated Saurians]]'' which takes place inside the [[Phlogiston Extraction Research Center]] at [[Coatepec Mountain]], [[Natlan]].
